thread.title: Friendly seal jumps on man's boat, starts cuddle session
thread.title_full: Friendly seal jumps on man's boat, starts cuddle session | www.ajc.com

author: Samantha Jordan
title: Friendly seal jumps on man's boat, starts cuddle session
text:
A friendly seal not only wanted to make human contact but needed some cuddle time as well and the adorable moment was caught on camera.
According to the Chicago Sun-Times , the cute sea creature jumped aboard a man's boat as he was floating in the water by the Coronado Bridge in San Diego. The two immediately formed a bond, and the seal found its new BFF.
>> Read more trending stories
"Here's my new friend," the man says as he films the seal snuggling against his back, closing his eyes and looking completely content.
It's not known how long this cuddle session lasted, but the video has made countless people smile and has been viewed more than 300,000 times in 3 days on YouTube.
